content: join the divine debris newsletter so you never miss a free pattern release 1 > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 2 **description ** with the summer winding down maybe that s not true but in my heart i d like it to be true this design helps you to layer for those cooler temps the kieran cardi is easy light and goes so well with any tank top or shirt you can layer it with it s the easy and fun cardi that will be perfect for those late summer nights the sample for this pattern was made using coboo by lion brand yarn 3 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2021 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/5f332ef6307c1600262237d9 2 https //divinedebris com/free-kieran-cardigan-crochet-pattern-by-divine-debris/ 3 https //shrsl com/3118e
